name: Treasure Room (jutjuan)
description:
TREASURE ROOM

This is my second game as game developer and my entry for Ludum Dare 44,  made in three days, with the theme "Your Life is Currency". As a begginer i would be really grateful for any feedback or suggenstions.

INSTRUCTIONS: The objective of the game is collecting 1000 gold coins. Every round your remaining health Will convert into gold, so the less damage you take, the faster you  will be able to finish the challenge. Pd: Full screen is Strongly recommended.

Good luck and have fun!
